metadata.name: In praise of beauty ( 1 )
metadata.description:
"Man is the measure of all things"
This is a quote from Greek philosopher "Protagoras" regarding the theory of humanism. Humanism was fundamental to the Renaissance movement. Generally, I have always found the paintings of this movement to be a good example of portrait photography. Portrait photography has its origins in painting.
Leonardo da Vinci's Vitruvius Man is a classic painting depicting Renaissance art and human fitness, a symbol of humanism.
Due to this view, I have become interested in incorporating this symbol and concept into my work.

Edition 1/1
Image size - 6877 x 4912
Created - June 2022
